title: Jester's Arrow
summaries: Jester's Arrow is a type of arrow. It is unaffected by gravity and can pierce an infinite number of enemies. It emits an ample amount of light when fired, making it useful for lighting up dark areas like caves. When hitting an enemy or block, it vanishes in a shower of non-damaging sparks. In addition to being crafted, Jester's Arrows can be found in Gold Chests in the Underground and Cavern layers.

Jester's Arrows can be considered an upgrade of <linked>Unholy Arrows</linked>. Their unlimited piercing makes them efficient against enemies with multiple segments such as the <linked>Eater of Worlds</linked>, and may occasionally render them stronger than otherwise better arrows, such as the <linked>Hellfire Arrow</linked>.
Jester's Arrows are never recoverable after use ( unlike other arrows).
